title: This Baby Is Killing Our Sex Life
description:
In this very intimate and vulnerable episode, Shan sits down with her husband, Jared, to discuss the real fears they have about the future of their marriage and intimacy now that baby #2 is on the way. Being in new territory, Shan tries to learn as much as she can about how others have navigated similar challenges including her audience, her mother, her sister, and Erica Dickerson and Milah Mapp from the podcast Good Moms, Bad Choices.


 

Follow Shan on Instagram: www.instagram.com/shanboody
Keep up to date with Shan and upcoming Lovers and Friends casting calls: www.shanboodram.com/join


 

Follow “Good Moms, Bad Choices” on Instagram: www.instagram.com/goodmoms_badchoices
Listen to their podcast wherever you are listening to this podcast


 

Follow Lauren Morrison on Instagram: www.instagram.com/thisislaurenelizabeth
Follow Olivia Boodram on Instagram: www.instagram.com/yourtravelwitholivia
